BBEX3.M.AOA.EUR.CA.AA.A01: Exchange rates for the euro in Angola / EUR 1 = AOA ... (buying)
General: With effect from 13 December 1999, a currency changeover took place to the ratio of 1,000,000 AOR (readjusted kwanza) = 1 AOA (kwanza).
Source: Banco Nacional de Angola, Luanda.

Comment on 1999-12: With effect from 13 December 1999, a currency changeover took place. We recorded the following exchange rates (buying/selling rate).10 December 1999: EUR 1 = AOR 5,531,426 / 5,622,07713 December 1999: EUR 1 = AOA 5.50 / 5.60.
Comment on 2003-12: Exchange rate as of 5 January 2004.
Comment on 2006-11: Exchange rate as of 1 December 2006.
Comment on 2011-09: Exchange rate as of 3 October 2011.
